summary: The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo (Motoko canister code), frontend page/component files (via frontend-file-summaries.txt), frontend/public/sw.js (service worker), and project_state.json. These changes appear to be feature/bug-fix work rather than mainnet deployment configuration. There is no evidence of deployment configuration files (dfx.json mainnet network settings, canister IDs for mainnet, deploy scripts, CI/CD pipeline changes, or any ic-deployment artifacts) being added or modified. The service worker update (sw.js) partially addresses the PWA manifest/service worker requirement, but the core deployment infrastructure changes are absent.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the backend Motoko canister to the IC mainnet so all existing API methods are callable.
missing_requirements.reason: No dfx.json mainnet network configuration, canister_ids.json, deploy scripts, or CI/CD pipeline changes targeting mainnet are present in the diff. backend/main.mo was modified but no deployment artifacts or configuration targeting mainnet were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the frontend React PWA to the IC mainnet and make it accessible via a public https://<canister-id>.icp0.io URL.
missing_requirements.reason: No dfx.json frontend canister configuration for mainnet, no canister_ids.json, no build/deploy scripts targeting IC mainnet, and no evidence of frontend asset canister deployment setup are present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: New /partner-panel (PartnerPanel) and /admin/rates (AdminRates) routes added to the frontend router.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states non-goals include adding new features or screens. These two new routes and their associated pages were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: UPI QR code section added to the Payment screen showing QR image, UPI ID bhangarwala@upi, total amount, and Copy UPI ID button.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request prohibits adding new features or changing existing feature logic. This is a new UI feature not requested in REQ-35.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced PaymentSuccess screen with polished receipt card, line-items table, Download Receipt via window.print(), and no-print CSS class.
hallucinated_features.reason: This is a new feature enhancement not requested in REQ-35 and violates the constraint against altering existing feature logic or UI.
